```{r}
source("Main.R")
```

```{r}
ron_desantis_data<-republican_party_primary_polling|>filter(Candidate=="Ron Desantis")|>mutate(Poll_Boundary=ifelse(State=="NULL","Nationwide",State))
head(ron_desantis_data)
```
```{r}

ron_desantis_chart<-ron_desantis_data|>ggplot(aes(x=DMY,y=Polling,color=Poll_Boundary)) + geom_point(alpha=0.6) + geom_line() +scale_x_date(date_breaks="3 months") + labs(title="Ron Desantis",x="Date",Y="Polling (%)")
ron_desantis_chart
```
```{r}
ron_desantis_summary<- ron_desantis_data|>summarise(avg_polling=round(mean(Polling,na.rm=TRUE),digits=2), weighted_avg_polling=round(sum(Sample_Size/sum(Sample_Size,na.rm=TRUE) * Polling,na.rm=TRUE),digits=2),
                                                    standard_deviation=round(sd(Polling,na.rm=TRUE),digits=2),maximum_polling=max(Polling),minimum_polling=min(Polling),median_polling=median(Polling))
print(ron_desantis_summary) 
```
